title: Personal Portfolio
desc: Elevate your online presence with a sleek and responsive personal portfolio built on Next.js. Seamlessly integrate dynamic content and showcase your skills and projects with style, leveraging Next.js's powerful features for a seamless and engaging user experience

title: E-Commerce website
lang: PERN-Stack, Docker, Nginx, Kubernetes, AWS, Vercel
desc: The E-Commerce Full-Stack Application offers a seamless online shopping experience with cutting-edge technologies. Powered by Next.js for the frontend, Strapi for backend, PostgreSQL for the database, and Docker for containerization, it presents a modern, scalable e-commerce platform.

title: Social Media App
desc: Connect and share seamlessly with our Social Media App, a MERN stack-powered platform offering secure authentication, real-time updates, and interactive features for creating, liking, and commenting on posts.

title: Resume Generator
desc: Craft a user-friendly resume generator using Vanilla JavaScript, harnessing the power of local storage for seamless data persistence. Seamlessly create and store personalized resumes with ease, offering a streamlined solution for professional document creation
